name: Rara Lake and Bardia National Park Trip
description: Rara Lake Trek gives you the chance to reach the heavenly world. The scenery of this place is marvelous. It is a perfect place for refreshment. The beauty of lake and its surrounding will amaze you. Blooming rhododendron and other flowers during the spring season works to enhance the beauty of this place. Similarly when we visit Bardia National Park we can enjoy the jungle activities and watch the wild animals live in front of our eyes.
